overview: Pathfinder, a white man raised by the Mohican Indians, joins forces with the British army to avenge himself on the Mingo warriors and the French, who have brought death and pillage to his people. He takes on a mission to retrieve secret plans from within the French fort at St. Vicente.
tagline: THE LOVE STORY OF THE GREATEST INDIAN-FIGHTER OF THEM ALL!
title: The Pathfinder
